summary: Tron Gets Into Samsung Blockchain Keystore + 14 More Crypto News
title: Tron Gets Into Samsung Blockchain Keystore + 14 More Crypto News
content: Crypto Briefs is your daily bite-sized digest of cryptocurrency and blockchain-related news – keeping you up-to-date with under the radar crypto news from around the world.
Justin Sun. Source: a video screenshot, Youtube/Tron Foundation

Zero-knowledge proof privacy solution by QEDIT, a privacy-enhancing technology provider based on zero-knowledge proof cryptography, has been integrated in professional services company Deloitte’s ‘Eduscrypt’ platform, the emailed announcement states. The Eduscrypt platform uses blockchain technology to enable organizations to track, share, and validate qualifications of staff.
